actions.text: Shuster amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. The modification makes technical changes.
On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment makes technical and conforming changes; makes modifications to several projects in the reported bill; authorizes several environmental restoration and infrastructure projects; and includes additional flood control and navigation projects.
purpose: An amendment to make technical changes, authorize several environmental restoration projects, and include additional flood control and navigation projects.
